00023 #pragma once
00024 
00025 #include <l4/re/cap_alloc>
00026 #include <l4/re/util/cap_alloc>
00027 #include <l4/re/env>
00028 #include <l4/re/rm>
00029 #include <l4/re/util/event_buffer>
00030 #include <l4/sys/factory>
00031 
00032 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00033 
00040 template< typename PAYLOAD >
00041 class Event_t
00042 {
00043 public:
00047   enum Mode
00048   {
00049     Mode_irq,      
00050     Mode_polling,  
00051   };
00052 
00061   int init(L4::Cap<L4Re::Event> event, Mode mode = Mode_irq,
00062            L4Re::Env const *env = L4Re::Env::env(),
00063            L4Re::Cap_alloc *ca = L4Re::Cap_alloc::get_cap_alloc(L4Re::Util::cap_alloc))
00064   {
00065     Auto_cap<L4Re::Dataspace>::Cap ev_ds = ca->alloc<L4Re::Dataspace>();
00066     if (!ev_ds.is_valid())
00067       return -L4_ENOMEM;
00068 
00069     int r;
00070 
00071     Auto_del_cap<L4::Irq>::Cap ev_irq;
00072 
00073     if (mode == Mode_irq)
00074       {
00075         ev_irq = ca->alloc<L4::Irq>();
00076         if (!ev_irq.is_valid())
00077           return -L4_ENOMEM;
00078 
00079         if ((r = l4_error(env->factory()->create_irq(ev_irq.get()))))
00080           return r;
00081 
00082         if ((r = l4_error(event->bind(0, ev_irq.get()))))
00083           return r;
00084       }
00085 
00086     if ((r = event->get_buffer(ev_ds.get())))
00087       return r;
00088 
00089     long sz = ev_ds->size();
00090     if (sz < 0)
00091       return sz;
00092 
00093     Rm::Auto_region<void*> buf;
00094 
00095     if ((r = env->rm()->attach(&buf, sz, L4Re::Rm::Search_addr, ev_ds.get())))
00096       return r;
00097 
00098     _ev_buffer = L4Re::Event_buffer_t<PAYLOAD>(buf.get(), sz);
00099     _ev_ds     = ev_ds;
00100     _ev_irq    = ev_irq;
00101     _buf       = buf;
00102 
00103     return 0;
00104   }
00105 
00110   L4Re::Event_buffer_t<PAYLOAD> &buffer() { return _ev_buffer; }
00111 
00116   L4::Cap<L4::Irq> irq() const { return _ev_irq.get(); }
00117 
00118 private:
00119   Auto_cap<L4Re::Dataspace>::Cap _ev_ds;
00120   Auto_del_cap<L4::Irq>::Cap _ev_irq;
00121   L4Re::Event_buffer_t<PAYLOAD> _ev_buffer;
00122   Rm::Auto_region<void*> _buf;
00123 };
00124 
00125 typedef Event_t<Default_event_payload> Event;
00126 
00127 }}
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
